subject: AI & Agents
title: Markdown, Tables, and Lists on Demand
description: A short lesson to help you apply Markdown, Tables, and Lists on Demand.

hook.text: You wanted a clean comparison table, but got a wall of prose instead.

buildup.text: Models follow format cues. If you don't specify, they pick their own style.

discovery.text: Say exactly what format: 'Reply as a markdown table with columns: X, Y, Z.'

twist.text: Provide an example row. Models match the pattern far better than verbal descriptions.

climax.text: For bullet lists, specify nesting depth: 'Use two levels of bullets maximum.'

punchline.text: Specify the shape. Get the shape.

quiz.question: What's the best way to get a specific output format?
options: Specify the format and give an example
